textAfterTable: Reviews vote up 0 vote down SD seems to finally have something here. At least… March 6, 2009 Bill Kornke 20 reviewer rep Rating: Design: mummy Fill: 700 Temperature Rating: 15 deg F Weight: ~2lb 1oz Price Paid: $270 SD seems to finally have something here. At least for the ultra-light crowd. After rejecting the Marmot Helium 15 and the SD Arrow Rock 15 I chose the Nitro 15 for the design, quality, performance and value.
